sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  #app
    div.loading(v-if='loading') Loading...
    router-view
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'app',
  computed: {
    loading () {
      return this.$store.getters.getLoadingState
    }
  }
}

</script>
<style lang="scss">
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto+Condensed:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,700;1,300;1,400;1,700&display=swap');
body {
  margin: 0px;
}
a {
  margin: 0px;
}
.loading {
  position: fixed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
  background-color:#0000009e;
  color: white;
  z-index: 10;
  font-size: 24px;
}

</style>
